entry.title: The Northern Ireland (Emergency Provisions) Act 1996 (Silent Video Recording of Interviews) Order 1998
The Northern Ireland (Emergency Provisions) Act 1996 (Code of Practice) Order 1998
The Local Authorities (Goods and Services) (Public Bodies) Order 1998
The Beef Carcase (Classification) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1998
The Council Tax (Discounts) (Scotland) Amendment Order 1998
The Council Tax (Discounts) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 1998
The Finance Act 1989, section 178(1), (Appointed Day) Order 1998
The Taxes (Interest Rate) (Amendment) Regulations 1998
The London Docklands Development Corporation (Alteration of Designated Areas) Order 1998
The A40 Trunk Road (Western Avenue, Ealing) (Speed Limits) Order 1998
The Children (Protection at Work) Regulations 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Children and Young Persons Acts 1933 and 1963 and the Children and Young Persons (Scotland) Act 1937 in order to implement in relation to children the provisions of the 1994 EC Directive on the Protection of Young People at Work (94/33/EC).

entry.title: The Council Tax (Discount Disregards) (Amendment) Regulations 1998
The Dual-Use and Related Goods (Export Control) (Amendment) Regulations 1998
entry.summary: The Dual-Use and Related Goods (Export Control) Regulations 1996, made in implementation of and pursuant to Council Regulation (EC) No. 3381/94 on the control of exports of dual-use goods (OJ No. L367, 31.12.94, p.1), contain references to Council Decision No. 94/942/CFSP on the joint action adopted by the Council of the European Union on the basis of Article J3 of the Treaty on European Union concerning the control of exports of dual-use goods (OJ No. L367, 31.12.94, p.8). The Decision has now been further amended by Council Decision No. 98/106/CFSP. These Regulations:

entry.title: The Brunei (Appeals) (Amendment) Order 1998
The Merchant Shipping (Prevention of Pollution) (Amendment) Order 1998
Visiting Forces and International Headquarters (Application of Law) (Amendment) Order 1998
The Council Tax (Exempt Dwellings and Discount Disregards) (Amendment) Order 1998
The Council Tax (Demand Notices) (Wales) (Transitional Provisions) Regulations 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations apply to Wales. They make provision for council tax demand notices relating to the financial year 1998/99 to include information as to the effect (where applicable) of the council tax reduction scheme for that year.

entry.title: The Church Representation Rules (Amendment) Resolution 1998
The Chester Waterworks Company (Constitution and Regulation) Order 1998
entry.summary: Section 12(1) of the Statutory Water Companies Act 1991 provides for the replacement of provisions relating to the constitution and regulation of a statutory water company contained in its local Acts and Orders by provisions contained in a memorandum and articles which have been approved by special resolution of the members of the company. The replacement provisions have effect only if they are approved by the Secretary of State and come into force on such date as he determines.
